00019 
00020 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00021 #include "MisrError.h"
00022 
00023 /* P(Nref) is the path number corresponding to a reference
00024    orbit number Nref.  It is assumed that Nref is the earliest
00025    orbit for which (a) the orbit has stabliized and (b) we
00026    would be interested in looking at data. */
00027 
00028 /*static const int Nref = 1100;*/
00029 
00030 /*   J(Nref) is the Julian date corresponding to the start of
00031    orbit Nref, or alternatively, the GMT date and time of
00032    the start of orbit Nref, fromwhich J(Nref) can be calculated. */
00033 
00034 /* Start of orbit 1100 is 2000-03-02 21:14:00 */
00035 /*static const double JNref = 2451606.38472;*/
00036 
00037 /* Orbit Start Times */
00038 #define MISR_ORBIT_REF_995 2451599.189583333 /* 995 24 Feb 2000 16:33:00 */
00039 #define MISR_ORBIT_REF_DT 1000
